	address             input   32
	set                 input   8
	tag                 input   19
	offset              input   4
	index               input   12
	selection_signal    input   2
	clk                 input   1
	reset               input   1
	data_in             input   32
	write               input   1
	out                 output  32
	hit                 output  1
	miss                output  1
